author: Your Discord Name (e.g., YourUsername#1234)
description: Automatically announces when Twitch streams go live and manages 'Live' roles.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Twitch channel names, Discord channel IDs, role IDs, and Twitch API credentials to function. This data is not shared with third parties.
install_msg: Thanks for installing Twitchy! Use [p]twitchy setup to configure your Twitch API keys and streamers.
name: Twitchy
